author: Blender Guru
description:
Let's texture that donut 🍩
New parts releasing every other day 🔜

In this video we'll texture the table, plate, donut and icing using textures from Poliigon.

Download all textures: https://www.poliigon.com/donut
Download Poliigon addon: https://www.poliigon.com/blender


=== Chapter Marks ✂️===
0:20 Introduction
0:20 Adding an image texture
2:34 What are PBR Textures?
4:24 Manually importing PBR textures
15:57 Importing PBR textures with the Poliigon Addon
18:13 Texturing the speckled plate
21:37 Texturing the icing
27:42 Texturing the donut

title: Blender Donut Tutorial - Part 5 (Texturing)
